input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Google Keep Sync on MacBook Pro

Hello customer support, I hope this message finds you well. I am encountering issues with the sync feature of Google Keep on my MacBook Pro, which started after I installed Apache Hadoop 3.2.1 My name is Elena Ivanova.. I have attempted various troubleshooting steps, including restarting my device, reinstalling Google Keep, and reviewing my Twitch Studio Beta settings, but the problem remains unresolved. I kindly request your assistance in addressing this matter. Please inform me of any further actions I can take or if you need additional details from me You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. I am eager to hear from you soon. Thank you for your support and assistance.
